articles.description: Signal was asked to provide authorities with information about its users, something Signal doesn't collect at all.

articles.title: Orlando Pirates make history for South Africa - SowetanLIVE
articles.description: Orlando Pirates lost 1-0 to Enyimba at Enyimba International Stadium in Aba‚ Nigeria late on Wednesday night‚ but still made history for South Africa reached the Caf Confederation Cup quarterfinals.

articles.title: Govt now has eight weeks to decide on powership project after it clears environmental hurdle - News24
articles.description: Karpowership SA, the company bidding to moor five powerships in South African harbours for 20 years, cleared another hurdle when its environmental assessors ruled that the projects at the ports of Saldanha Bay, Richards Bay and Ngqura could go ahead.
